Array of all structures attached to this notification by .
The to use when playing the sound.
The default value of .
The audio stream type to use when playing the sound.
A large-format version of , giving the Notification an opportunity to show more detail.
One of the predefined notification categories (see the CATEGORY_* constants) that best describes this Notification.
Notification category: alarm or timer.
Notification category: incoming call (voice or video) or similar synchronous communication request.
Notification category: asynchronous bulk message (email).
Notification category: error in background operation or authentication status.
Notification category: calendar event.
Notification category: incoming direct message (SMS, instant message, etc.
Notification category: progress of a long-running background operation.
Notification category: promotion or advertisement.
Notification category: a specific, timely recommendation for a single thing.
Notification category: indication of running background service.
Notification category: social network or sharing update.
Notification category: ongoing information about device or contextual status.
Notification category: system or device status update.
Notification category: media transport control for playback.

Docs.summary: Creates and returns a copy of this Object.
Accent color (an ARGB integer like the constants in ) to be applied by the standard Style templates when presenting this notification.
Special value of telling the system not to decorate this notification with any special color but instead use default colors when presenting this notification.
The intent to execute when the expanded status entry is clicked.
The view that will represent this notification in the expanded status bar.
Parcelable.
Specifies which values should be taken from the defaults.
The intent to execute when the notification is explicitly dismissed by the user, either with the "Clear All" button or by swiping it away individually.

Docs.summary: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable's marshalled representation.
key: A pointing to an image that can be displayed in the background when the notification is selected.
key: this is the longer text shown in the big form of a notification, as supplied to .
key: the indices of actions to be shown in the compact view, as supplied to (e.g.
key: this is a small piece of additional text as supplied to .
key: this is a bitmap to be used instead of the small icon when showing the notification payload, as supplied to .
key: this is a bitmap to be used instead of the one from when the notification is shown in its expanded form, as supplied to .
key: A associated with a notification.
key: A String array containing the people that this notification relates to, each of which was supplied to .
key: this is a bitmap to be shown in expanded notifications, supplied to .
key: this is the progress value supplied to .
key: whether the progress bar is indeterminate, supplied to .
key: this is the maximum value supplied to .
Additional semantic data to be carried around with this Notification.
key: whether should be shown as a count-up timer (specifically a ) instead of a timestamp, as supplied to .
key: whether should be shown, as supplied to .
key: this is the resource ID of the notification's main small icon, as supplied to .
key: this is a third line of text, as supplied to .
key: this is a line of summary information intended to be shown alongside expanded notifications, as supplied to (e.g.
key: A string representing the name of the specific used to create this notification.
key: this is the main text payload, as supplied to .
key: An array of CharSequences to show in expanded notifications, each of which was supplied to .
key: this is the title of the notification, as supplied to .
key: this is the title of the notification when shown in expanded form, e.g. as supplied to .
An intent to launch instead of posting the notification to the status bar.
Get the key used to group this notification into a cluster or stack with other notifications on devices which support such rendering.
A medium-format version of , providing the Notification an opportunity to add action buttons to contentView.
The resource id of a drawable to use as the icon in the status bar.
If the icon in the status bar is to have more than one level, you can set this.
An activity that provides a user interface for adjusting notification preferences for its containing application.
A large bitmap to be shown in the notification content area.
The color of the led.
The number of milliseconds for the LED to be off while it's flashing.
The number of milliseconds for the LED to be on while it's flashing.
The number of events that this notification represents.
Relative priority for this notification.

Replacement version of this notification whose content will be shown in an insecure context such as atop a secure keyguard.
